title: Psalms 86:1
text: BOW down thine ear, O LORD, hear me: for I am poor and needy.

title: Psalms 86:2
text: Preserve my soul; for I am holy: O thou my God, save thy servant that trusteth in thee.

title: Psalms 86:3
text: Be merciful unto me, O Lord: for I cry unto thee daily.

title: Psalms 86:4
text: Rejoice the soul of thy servant: for unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.

title: Psalms 86:5
text: For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.

title: Psalms 86:6
text: Give ear, O LORD, unto my prayer; and attend to the voice of my supplications.

title: Psalms 86:7
text: In the day of my trouble I will call upon thee: for thou wilt answer me.

title: Psalms 86:8
text: Among the gods there is none like unto thee, O Lord; neither are there any works like unto thy works.

title: Psalms 86:9
text: All nations whom thou hast made shall come and worship before thee, O Lord; and shall glorify thy name.

title: Psalms 86:10
text: For thou art great, and doest wondrous things: thou art God alone.

title: Psalms 86:11
text: Teach me thy way, O LORD; I will walk in thy truth: unite my heart to fear thy name.

title: Psalms 86:12
text: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with all my heart: and I will glorify thy name for evermore.

title: Psalms 86:13
text: For great is thy mercy toward me: and thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest hell.

title: Psalms 86:14
text: O God, the proud are risen against me, and the assemblies of violent men have sought after my soul; and have not set thee before them.

title: Psalms 86:15
text: But thou, O Lord, art a God full of compassion, and gracious, longsuffering, and plenteous in mercy and truth.

title: Psalms 86:16
text: O turn unto me, and have mercy upon me; give thy strength unto thy servant, and save the son of thine handmaid.

title: Psalms 86:17
text: Shew me a token for good; that they which hate me may see it, and be ashamed: because thou, LORD, hast holpen me, and comforted me.
